33 typedef std::shared_ptr<class DataSource> DataSourceRef;
34 
35 class DataSource {
36  public:
37  virtual bool isFilePath() = 0;
38  virtual bool isUrl() = 0;
39 
40  const fs::path& getFilePath();
41  const Url& getUrl();
42  const std::string& getFilePathHint();
43 
44  Buffer& getBuffer();
45  virtual IStreamRef createStream() = 0;
46 
47  protected:
48  DataSource( const fs::path &aFilePath, const Url &aUrl )
49  : mFilePath( aFilePath ), mUrl( aUrl )
50  {}
51  virtual ~DataSource() {}
52 
53  virtual void createBuffer() = 0;
54 
55  void setFilePathHint( const std::string &aFilePathHint );
56 
57  Buffer mBuffer;
58  fs::path mFilePath;
59  std::string mFilePathHint;
60  Url mUrl;
61 };

64 typedef std::shared_ptr<class DataSourcePath> DataSourcePathRef;
65 
66 class DataSourcePath : public DataSource {
67  public:
68  static DataSourcePathRef create( const fs::path &path );
69 
70  virtual bool isFilePath() { return true; }
71  virtual bool isUrl() { return false; }
72 
73  virtual IStreamRef createStream();
74 
75  protected:
76  explicit DataSourcePath( const fs::path &path );
77 
78  virtual void createBuffer();
79 
80  IStreamFileRef mStream;
81 };

83 DataSourceRef loadFile( const fs::path &path );

85 typedef std::shared_ptr<class DataSourceUrl> DataSourceUrlRef;
86 
87 class DataSourceUrl : public DataSource {
88  public:
89  static DataSourceUrlRef create( const Url &Url, const UrlOptions &options = UrlOptions() );
90 
91  virtual bool isFilePath() { return false; }
92  virtual bool isUrl() { return true; }
93 
94  virtual IStreamRef createStream();
95 
96  const UrlOptions& getOptions() const { return mOptions; }
97 
98  protected:
99  DataSourceUrl( const Url &Url, const UrlOptions &options );
100 
101  virtual void createBuffer();
102 
103  UrlOptions mOptions;
104  IStreamUrlRef mStream;
105 };
106 
107 DataSourceRef loadUrl( const Url &Url, const UrlOptions &options = UrlOptions() );
108 inline DataSourceRef loadUrl( const std::string &urlString, const UrlOptions &options = UrlOptions() ) { return loadUrl( Url( urlString ), options ); }
